resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
We\'re here to help you improve your yoga practice with real-time feedback on your poses. Get started by setting up your camera and start practicing!

Explore the various yoga poses, learn about correct alignments, and understand the benefits of each pose. Whether you are a beginner or an experienced yogi, you\'ll find helpful advice to enhance your practice.
From stress management to improving flexibility and balance, discover how yoga can contribute to your overall wellbeing.
Provide your account email that you want to reset the password!\n
Please check your email for instructions! (Make sure to check spam)
Checkout the Below Cards for Instructions on How to Use our App in order to Check your Pose.
Checkout some more content on How to Strike the Perfect Pose!
Select a Pose to begin checking your Accuracy\n
Wait for Verbal & on Screen Feedback and
Then you will be redirected towards your Result.
